Actions.Name: Get Nearby Radar
Actions.Description: Get nearest radar points to a latitude and longitude

Actions.Name: Get Radar
Actions.Description: Get metadata for a specific radar

Actions.Name: Get Radar Daily Summaries
Actions.Description: Get the daily summaries for a latitude and longitude based on the closest radar point

Actions.Name: Get Radar Monthly Summaries
Actions.Description: Get the monthly summaries for a latitude and longitude based on the closest radar point

Actions.Name: Get Radar Rainfall
Actions.Description: Get the rainfall for specific radars

Actions.Name: Get Radars
Actions.Description: Returns a list of radars and their metadata.
